channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NM
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NM

item.title: Report E-2024010045
item.description:
Report E-2024010045

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-12T18:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-20
  • City: ALBUQUERQUE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0

item.title: Report X-2024010320
item.description:
Report X-2024010320

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-12T18:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-26
  • City: ROSWELL
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2024010320 SequenceEvent: Package was found in trailer 55014 on the passenger side. orientation arrows were not flowed DescribePack: there was a loose cap DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Quick response of qualified personal. 2. X-2024010343 SequenceEvent: A member of management was notified and I was overhearing the conversation and acted to grab PPE. When I arrived operations were stopped and a Hazmat tote was ready for me. DescribePack: Loose cap DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Quick response to spill. operations were stops while in house cleanup was performed

item.title: Report X-2023120635
item.description:
Report X-2023120635

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-09T06:14:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-08
  • City: ALBUQUERQUE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: during the unloading process the package was leaking and was brought to qa. DescribePack: the two caps on the two bottles were not closed tightly enough. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: the package was placed in a black bin to prevent further leakage.
